name: The Golden Pyramids
overview: Suddenly the sky turned dark, permitting thunder and lightning to grow. Fire and death take the world by storm, creating fear in the minds of many. The ancient leaders have been awakened, their spirits parting with eternal sleep, combining forces to end a quest for gold. This quest is YOURS! Platform game created by Harold Klink and released in 64'er Top-Spiele #2, 64'er Top-Spiele #6, and also in 64'er 1999/06.
